methods.name: get_schema
methods.description: Request subset of column schemas for a table-like object

params.name: column_indices
params.description: The column indices (relative to the filtered/selected columns) to fetch

methods.name: search_schema
methods.summary: Search full, unfiltered table schema with column filters
methods.description: Search full, unfiltered table schema for column names matching one or more column filters

params.name: filters
params.description: Column filters to apply when searching

params.name: start_index
params.description: Index (starting from zero) of first result to fetch (for paging)

params.name: max_results
params.description: Maximum number of resulting column schemas to fetch from the start index

matches.description: A schema containing matching columns up to the max_results limit

total_num_matches.description: The total number of columns matching the filter

methods.name: get_data_values
methods.summary: Request formatted values from table columns
methods.description: Request data from table columns with values formatted as strings

params.name: format_options
params.description: Formatting options for returning data values as strings

methods.name: get_row_labels
methods.summary: Request formatted row labels from table
methods.description: Request formatted row labels from table

params.name: format_options
params.description: Formatting options for returning labels as strings

methods.name: export_data_selection
methods.summary: Export data selection as a string in different formats
methods.description: Export data selection as a string in different formats like CSV, TSV, HTML

data.description: Exported data as a string suitable for copy and paste

methods.name: set_column_filters
methods.summary: Set column filters to select subset of table columns
methods.description: Set or clear column filters on table, replacing any previous filters

params.name: filters
params.description: Column filters to apply (or pass empty array to clear column filters)

methods.name: set_row_filters
methods.summary: Set row filters based on column values
methods.description: Row filters to apply (or pass empty array to clear row filters)

params.name: filters
params.description: Zero or more filters to apply

schema.name: filter_result
schema.description: The result of applying filters to a table

selected_num_rows.description: Number of rows in table after applying filters

had_errors.description: Flag indicating if there were errors in evaluation

methods.name: set_sort_columns
methods.description: Set or clear the columns(s) to sort by, replacing any previous sort columns

params.name: sort_keys
params.description: Pass zero or more keys to sort by. Clears any existing keys

methods.name: get_column_profiles
methods.summary: Request a batch of column profiles
methods.description: Requests a statistical summary or data profile for batch of columns

params.name: format_options
params.description: Formatting options for returning data values as strings

methods.name: get_state
methods.description: Request the current backend state (table metadata, explorer state, and features)

schema.name: backend_state
schema.description: The current backend state for the data explorer

display_name.description: Variable name or other string to display for tab name in UI

table_shape.description: Number of rows and columns in table with row/column filters applied

table_unfiltered_shape.description: Number of rows and columns in table without any filters applied

has_row_labels.description: Indicates whether table has row labels or whether rows should be labeled by ordinal position

sort_keys.description: The currently applied column sort keys

supported_features.description: The features currently supported by the backend instance

column_display_type.description: Canonical Positron display name of data type

column_schema.description: Schema for a column in a table

column_name.description: Name of column as UTF-8 string

column_index.description: The position of the column within the table without any column filters

type_name.description: Exact name of data type used by underlying table

type_display.description: Canonical Positron display name of data type

timezone.description: Time zone for timestamp with time zone

type_size.description: Size parameter for fixed-size types (list, binary)

table_row_labels.description: Formatted table row labels formatted as strings

row_labels.description: Zero or more arrays of row labels

format_options.description: Formatting options for returning data values as strings

large_num_digits.description: Fixed number of decimal places to display for numbers over 1, or in scientific notation

small_num_digits.description: Fixed number of decimal places to display for small numbers, and to determine lower threshold for switching to scientific notation

max_integral_digits.description: Maximum number of integral digits to display before switching to scientific notation

max_value_length.description: Maximum size of formatted value, for truncating large strings or other large formatted values

table_schema.description: The schema for a table-like object

columns.description: Schema for each column in the table

table_shape.description: Provides number of rows and columns in a table

num_rows.description: Numbers of rows in the table

num_columns.description: Number of columns in the table

row_filter.description: Specifies a table row filter based on a single column's values

filter_type.description: Type of row filter to apply

condition.description: The binary condition to use to combine with preceding row filters

is_valid.description: Whether the filter is valid and supported by the backend, if undefined then true

error_message.description: Optional error message when the filter is invalid

row_filter_type_support_status.description: Support status for a row filter type

support_status.description: The support status for this row filter type

filter_between.description: Parameters for the 'between' and 'not_between' filter types

op.description: String representation of a binary comparison

value.description: A stringified column value for a comparison filter

values.description: Array of values for a set membership filter

inclusive.description: Filter by including only values passed (true) or excluding (false)

case_sensitive.description: If true, do a case-sensitive search, otherwise case-insensitive

text_search_type.description: Type of string text search filter to perform

column_filter.description: A filter that selects a subset of columns by name, type, or other criteria

filter_type.description: Type of column filter to apply

column_filter_params.description: Union of column filter type-specific parameters

column_filter_type_support_status.description: Support status for a column filter type

support_status.description: The support status for this column filter type

column_index.description: The column index (absolute, relative to unfiltered table) to profile

column_profile_spec.description: Parameters for a single column profile for a request for profiles

params.description: Extra parameters for different profile types

column_profile_params.description: Extra parameters for different profile types

column_profile_type_support_status.description: Support status for a given column profile type

profile_type.description: The type of analytical column profile

support_status.description: The support status for this column profile type

column_summary_stats.description: Profile result containing summary stats for a column based on the data type

type_display.description: Canonical Positron display name of data type

number_stats.description: Statistics for a numeric data type

string_stats.description: Statistics for a string-like data type

boolean_stats.description: Statistics for a boolean data type

date_stats.description: Statistics for a date data type

datetime_stats.description: Statistics for a datetime data type

median.description: Sample median (50% value) value as string

stdev.description: Sample standard deviation as a string

true_count.description: The number of non-null true values

false_count.description: The number of non-null false values

num_empty.description: The number of empty / length-zero values

num_unique.description: The exact number of distinct values
The exact number of distinct values

median_date.description: Sample median (50% value) date value as string

num_unique.description: The exact number of distinct values

median_date.description: Sample median (50% value) date value as string

timezone.description: Time zone for timestamp with time zone

column_histograms_params.description: Parameters to produce histograms for the summary profile

histogram.description: Parameters to build the smaller histogram

large_histogram.description: Parameters for the larger histogram used when the column is expanded

oneOf.name: num_bins_multiplier
oneOf.description: The number of bins will be this times larger as the number of bins of the smaller histogram

column_histogram_params.description: Parameters for a column histogram profile request

method.description: Method for determining number of bins

num_bins.description: Number of bins in the computed histogram

quantiles.description: Sample quantiles (numbers between 0 and 1) to compute along with the histogram

column_histograms.description: Result from a histogram profile request

histogram.description: A histogram used as the small sparkline plot.

large_histogram.description: A larger histogram, used when the column is expanded in the summary profile

column_histogram.description: A histogram object. Contains all necessary information to draw an histogram

bin_edges.description: String-formatted versions of the bin edges, there are N + 1 where N is the number of bins

bin_counts.description: Absolute count of values in each histogram bin

quantiles.description: Sample quantiles that were also requested

column_frequency_table_params.description: Parameters for a frequency_table profile request

limit.description: Number of most frequently-occurring values to return. The K in TopK

column_frequency_table.description: Result from a frequency_table profile request

other_count.description: Number of other values not accounted for in counts, excluding nulls/NA values. May be omitted

column_quantile_value.description: An exact or approximate quantile value from a column

q.description: Quantile number; a number between 0 and 1

exact.description: Whether value is exact or approximate (computed from binned data or sketches)

column_sort_key.description: Specifies a column to sort by

column_index.description: Column index (absolute, relative to unfiltered table) to sort by

supported_features.description: For each field, returns flags indicating supported features

search_schema.description: Support for 'search_schema' RPC and its features

set_column_filters.description: Support ofr 'set_column_filters' RPC and its features

set_row_filters.description: Support for 'set_row_filters' RPC and its features

get_column_profiles.description: Support for 'get_column_profiles' RPC and its features

set_sort_columns.description: Support for 'set_sort_columns' RPC and its features

export_data_selection.description: Support for 'export_data_selection' RPC and its features

support_status.description: The support status for this RPC method
The support status for this RPC method
The support status for this RPC method

supports_conditions.description: Whether AND/OR filter conditions are supported

support_status.description: The support status for this RPC method
The support status for this RPC method
The support status for this RPC method

table_selection.description: A selection on the data grid, for copying to the clipboard or other actions

kind.description: Type of selection, all indices relative to filtered row/column indices

data_selection_single_cell.description: A selection that contains a single data cell

data_selection_cell_range.description: A selection that contains a rectangular range of data cells

data_selection_range.description: A contiguous selection bounded by inclusive start and end indices

data_selection_indices.description: A selection defined by a sequence of indices to include

column_selection.description: A union of different selection types for column values

column_index.description: Column index (relative to unfiltered schema) to select data from

spec.description: Union of selection specifications for array_selection

array_selection.description: Union of selection specifications for array_selection

support_status.description: The support status of the RPC method
